page.title: 03OUR VILLAGE
page.content: I like Eaglesham because it is in the country and so has not so many people as in a town.The centre of the village is old and shaped like and an "A".In the centre of the "A" is a common green called The Orry with a stream running through it with two waterfalls.At the top there is a wood of broadleaved trees and then a grassy area with scattered trees.This is a great place to have picnics,play in, find plants,birds and animals and climb trees.At night coming into the village from East Kilbride the lights up the streets look like a runway and maybe someday an airliner might land there.Over the years streets have been added on around the original Eaglesham and I think they have spoiled it. However the centre still looks like a picture book especially in winter when white with snow and sparkling frost.
